item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, October 4, 2024 at 4:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Getting my daily news from a dot matrix printer (102 points | 38 comments)
2. 12 Months of Mandarin (43 points | 2 comments)
3. Show HN: Chebyshev approximation calculator (open source web app) (139 points | 22 comments)
4. Experimental web browser optimized for rabbit-holing (397 points | 83 comments)
5. NumPy QuadDType: Quadruple Precision for Everyone (23 points | 17 comments)
6. ESP8266 Analog Broadcast Television Interface (33 points | 6 comments)
7. Show HN: A tool for creating chord charts on the go (69 points | 22 comments)
8. Why does man print "gimme gimme gimme" at 00:30? (2017) (677 points | 287 comments)
9. Show HN: kew – A Terminal Music Player for Linux (62 points | 18 comments)
10. Meta Movie Gen (373 points | 310 comments)
11. Guy does demoscene tricks to ESP32 powered display (2022) (17 points | 2 comments)
12. Reverse Engineering and Dismantling Kekz Headphones (129 points | 24 comments)
13. Show HN: One – A new React framework unifying web, native and local-first (12 points | 3 comments)
14. Robert Dennard, DRAM Pioneer, has died (303 points | 26 comments)
15. Nowadays (YC S23) Is Hiring a Founding Engineer ( | hide)
16. Why Appalachia flooded so from Helene's remnants (6 points | 2 comments)
17. Were RNNs all we needed? (429 points | 212 comments)
18. Depth Pro: Sharp monocular metric depth in less than a second (58 points | 6 comments)
19. Patent troll Sable pays up, dedicates all its patents to the public (1194 points | 351 comments)
20. Why and how we’re migrating many of our servers from Linux to the BSDs (266 points | 151 comments)
21. MikroPhone: A privacy enhanced, simple and featured RISC-V mobile phone (194 points | 63 comments)
22. Canvas is a new way to write and code with ChatGPT (876 points | 628 comments)
23. Waymo and Hyundai enter multi-year, strategic partnership (72 points | 30 comments)
24. Perfctl: A Stealthy Malware Targeting Linux Servers (98 points | 24 comments)
25. The Silk Road (2023) (52 points | 9 comments)
26. Self-locking and stiffening deployable tubular structures (13 points | discuss)
27. Holocron is an object storage based leader election library (24 points | 3 comments)
28. Show HN: Screensavers for your terminal (Bevy/Ratatui) (85 points | 18 comments)
29. Dance training superior to physical exercise in inducing brain plasticity (2018) (291 points | 170 comments)
30. HTTrack Website Copier (105 points | 28 comments)
